ygData.subject: Re: Gnoll Hide Lariet - Secret nerf?
ygData.msgSnippet: It seemed to proc decently for me last night.  I only really see it proc when it s resisted, as the blue message blends in and the red stands out. :) Darkfox
ygData.messageBody:
It seemed to proc decently for me last night. I only "really" see it proc
when it's resisted, as the blue message blends in and the red stands out. :)

Darkfox Reven'tsol



> From: "Stephen E. McCloskey" <s.mccloskey@...>
>
> I got my first one a couple weeks ago and my second one last night. I
used
> it at first just to try it out and I liked the speed. I saw the "you
don't
> have the will" message frequently (I am only 21, it procs at 25). Well, I
> put it back in to the bank for a while. The other day I brought it back
> out in place of my tentacle whip because it is a difference of 2 or 3 in
> weight and I was on a fairly strict weight limit. As I used it over the
> next couple hours I didn't see a single "will" message. I dual weiled the
> GHL last night for about 20 minutes and still didn't see any messages.
The
> other day I heard the Mistwalker's procs were nerfed to %25 of what it
was.
> Does anyone know if the GHL has been nerfed also? I enjoy the speed of
> them, but if they are nerfed they become rather usless with a base of 3
damage.
>
>
